records.header: Marshall Gittler's Market Outlook: USD up, EUR down on risk-off; UK CPI, FOMC minutes
records.preview: A typical “risk off” profile to the FX market: CHF and JPY were the two best-performing currencies, while the commodity currencies were the biggest losers.

records.header: Endurance is one of the most important qualities of a trader
records.preview: When a trend dominates the market, few doubt who controls the situation.

records.header: Precious metals prices are being corrected Tuesday morning. Go on looking for good sell prices
